name: Plum Slam
description:
PLUM SLAM

Plum Slam is a puzzle-platformer where you are a piece of bread, trying to make it to the jam jar to finish the level.

Slamming plums will add jam to the side you slam with, and you can use the jam to stick to walls.

You will have to manage your jam and the sides of your bread in order to succeed.

Plum Slam was made as part of Media Design School's first "Plum Jam", a three day game jam.

THE TEAM

Art

Danny Hwangbo

Sophia Rawson

Programming

Sam Fortune

Tim Sinclair
